definition: to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)
three-stroke form of Kangxi radical 94 犬[quan3]
to break the rules/an illegality/a foul
to infringe on/to encroach on/to violate/to assault
escaped criminal/fugitive from the law (criminal suspect on the run)
to err/to make a mistake/to do the wrong thing

sentences.english: In joint offense has transitional form of crimes, also exists surplus behavior.
sentences.chinese: 共同犯罪中既存在轉化犯，也存在過限問題。

sentences.english: He has done a great deal more years than many murderers, pedophiles and psychopaths .
sentences.chinese: 他的時間比許多謀殺犯，戀童癖者和精神病患者都多。

sentences.english: Tiffany told me and the police that he had a heart stroke while they were in bed.
sentences.chinese: 蒂芙妮對警察對我說是他是在牀上犯了心臟病猝死。

sentences.english: In retrospect, I’d say that Huntington committed the Fundamental Attribution Error.
sentences.chinese: 回頭來看，我認爲亨廷頓犯了“基本的歸因錯誤”。

sentences.english: Any judicial officer who abuses his power and commits the crime mentioned in the preceding paragraph shall be given a heavier punishment.
sentences.chinese: 司法工作人員濫用職權，犯前款罪的，從重處罰。

sentences.english: Tactuality is no man but errs.
It is proved that to over-correct is another fault.
sentences.chinese: 矯枉過正不過是在錯誤的基礎上又犯了另一個錯誤。

sentences.english: You have made two blunders in as many minutes.
sentences.chinese: 你在兩分鐘內就犯了兩次大錯。

sentences.english: Whorf, we now know, made many mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們知道，沃爾夫當時的確犯了許多錯誤。

sentences.english: The offense of conspiracy is a kind of concurrence of articles of law.
sentences.chinese: 陰謀犯是一種法規競合犯的形態。

sentences.english: The heart of that ex-convict was full of virginity .
sentences.chinese: 這個老苦役犯的心裏充滿了處子的純真。

sentences.english: He was careful not to make any slip in his report.
sentences.chinese: 他小心注意不要在報告裏犯任何小錯。

sentences.english: The exiles were forbidden to return at the peril of their lives.
sentences.chinese: 流放犯已被禁止返回，違者處死。

sentences.english: And if a woman shall put away her husband, and be married to another, she committeth adultery.
sentences.chinese: 妻子若離棄丈夫另嫁，也是犯奸淫了。

definition: to err/to make a mistake/to do the wrong thing
